metadata.name: Quarantined
metadata.description: Part 1 - In a small town in Michigan's Upper Peninsula, a virus turns nearly every resident into a vicious killing machine. A group of uninfected is trapped within the town, abandoned with dwindling resources. These survivors must fight against the infected, as well as the paranoia growing between them. Sparked by a mysterious stranger, the survivors dig into the town's secrets as they hatch their escape, yet none of them are prepared for what they discover.
